channel.title: Help with Java or Client
channel.description:
Well, it was working fine the otherday, but then when i closed client down to go and eat, i came back, tried to come onto the client, and it just didnt work, i double click onto "Run.Bat" and it comes up and closes within like 0.5secs this is what it says "`Java` Is not Regogised As an Internal Or External Command , Operable Program Or Batch File" PrtScrn ftw , so would someone please help, you can post on here, or contact me on MSN, or if you have steam, add me, heres my details.
MSN - aronricketts93@hotmail.com Steam - Ricketts20
Thanks guys, hoping to play soon,

item.title: Help with Java or Client
item.dc:creator: @Ricketts93 Ricketts93
item.description:
@Ricketts93 wrote:

Well, it was working fine the otherday, but then when i closed client down to go and eat, i came back, tried to come onto the client, and it just didnt work, i double click onto “Run.Bat” and it comes up and closes within like 0.5secs this is what it says "Java Is not Regogised As an Internal Or External Command , Operable Program Or Batch File" PrtScrn ftw
, so would someone please help, you can post on here, or contact me on MSN, or if you have steam, add me, heres my details.
